overview: Benny is the proud owner of a new house where he lives together with his two bodyguards, he invites all his friends to a hot house warming party. Before the arrival of his guest Benny gets a full treatment by his cute bodyguards. Once all guest have arrived, Benny suggest some little games and competitions. The end of the party is near and everwhere in the house it's top and bottom action. While most guys already sip their farewell drinks at the bar. Benny still gets his treatmen by his personal favorite... Mr. Luky.
title: House of Pleasure
